Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: ASW
Reviews.Content: Received these cables and made the mistake of running the first one through walls and over a roof ONLY to find out that they don't twist into the camera wire leads properly. Had to force them into the connectors from the cameras. Decided to go ahead with the install anyway. Now I have interference on my monitor. I had an alarm/surveillance guy look at the video and he agreed it was due to the cabling. I am returning these cables.

Reviews.Title: thin yet pretty durable
Reviews.Author: Mat Van Gogh
Reviews.Content: good  security cable. i used it for my outdoor camera. works good.thin yet fairly strong. im happy with it.

Reviews.Title: LTS LTAC2125W 125 Foot All-in-One BNC Video and Power Cable
Reviews.Author: JunMed
Reviews.Content: Just the right length.  The video resolution is just fine, a bit better than the original cable that came with the camera.

Reviews.Title: video cable
Reviews.Author: B. Wagner
Reviews.Content: I didn't want to splice two or more cables together to get from camera to dvr.  I used this cable for an outside installation and it performs well.  I have several other cameras outside my apartment complex that use this same cable for over two years and no problems.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and works great.
Reviews.Author: Elipi
Reviews.Content: So glad these are available so I can do this s*** myself.  Drives me nuts what the pro's charge to do this simple stuff.  This online ordering thing is great.

Reviews.Title: not as described only 100 foot
Reviews.Author: Gregg Johnston
Reviews.Content: Fair quality but it was not 125 feet. It was only 100 feet. Even the product label was wrong, checked with a tape.

Reviews.Title: Perfect performance
Reviews.Author: Dan Robbins
Reviews.Content: If you don't need audio, then this cable will reliably suit your needs. It carries both video and 12VDC camera power over a 60-foot distance between my outdoor cameras for my basement security DVR.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Dan Pelka
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I needed, and unlike my older video/power cables, this is all inside the one cable, instead of looking like two separate cables fused together. I used them for outdoor cameras, fed the cables through brick, concrete & sheetrock, no problems with connections. Shipped quickly!

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Dan "DAN"
Reviews.Content: Bought four of these cables and had no problems with any of them. Even with the power cable being used I get a good picture.

Reviews.Title: AV Cords
Reviews.Author: Carol "caejje"
Reviews.Content: Inexpensive and they were received quickly. They also worked with the intended item, a Night Owl Security System which had come with 50 foot wires. No problems so far but have not had them for very long.

Reviews.Title: BNC ALL IN ONE POWER CABLE
Reviews.Author: mary
Reviews.Content: I like it its slim cord allows me to run it thru small holes thur my travel trailer and into the bedroom its easy hook-up it works for me

Reviews.Title: security camera extension cables
Reviews.Author: Raypa
Reviews.Content: No need to buy pieces separatly, cables are worth the price. Sent quick as promised, even received quicker than expected.

Reviews.Title: Good cables
Reviews.Author: Casey Sorensen
Reviews.Content: I ordered 4 of these and 4 of the 60' cables. All worked well. Quality is great, not at thin as I expected. I had to fish them through several walls (brick, plaster and sheetrock) and tight spaces and had no issues. Would definitely recommend at this price.

Reviews.Title: Product was as described
Reviews.Author: Brian Fuchs
Reviews.Content: I've read several reviews about the cable being very delicate and thin.  Although it is much thinner than, say RG6, it seemed durable to me.  I had no issues with any conductors breaking.  It works for just about every security system (mine is Q-See brand)  Cable also comes with adapters (not shown in picture)At $10 for 60ft, you can't go wrong with this cable.

Reviews.Title: Power Cable
Reviews.Author: rca
Reviews.Content: Cable is well made & makes connections a snap. A pleasure to use an item that works as advertised.

ProductInfo.Features:
Pre-made 125 foot RG59 and power cable with connectors in black
Ready to use
Also available in white (LTAC2125W)
ProductInfo.Name: Laview LVA-ACA2125B 125 Foot All-in-One BNC Video and Power Cable with Connectors, Black
